channel.title: Theory on Leonardo Benicio
channel.description: Recent content in Theory on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Introduction to Automata Theory, Languages, and Computation (3rd ed.)
item.description: Classic text on automata, formal languages, Turing machines, and computational complexity.

item.title: Introduction to the Theory of Computation (3rd ed.)
item.description: Accessible introduction to automata theory, computability, and complexity.

item.title: On Computable Numbers, with an Application to the Entscheidungsproblem
item.description: Seminal paper introducing the concept of Turing machines and computability.

item.title: Principles of Database and Knowledge-Base Systems
item.description: Foundational theory for databases and knowledge-base systems.

item.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
item.description: Classic text teaching fundamental concepts of programming and abstraction using Scheme.

item.title: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
item.description: A classic text that teaches fundamental programming concepts and abstraction using Scheme.
